liquibase.database.SybaseConnectionDelegate

liquibase.database.SybaseConnectionDelegate Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.database.SybaseConnectionDelegate:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A Sybase specific Delegate that removes the calls to commit and rollback as Sybase requires that autocommit be set to true.

Author:
Paul Keeble
